hadiths.text: Ma'mar narrated from Ibn Tawus, from his father, from Hujr Al-Madari, from Zaid bin Thabit, from Prophet, who said:"'Umra (a gift given for life) is permissible

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى أَبِي الزُّبَيْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Abu Az-Zubair
